thread.title: Strangers Tend to Tell Me Things
thread.title_full: Strangers Tend to Tell Me Things

title: Strangers Tend to Tell Me Things
text:
Strangers Tend to Tell Me Things New Strangers Tend to Tell Me Things In stock $27.00 $27.00 Quick Overview: 
FREE GIFT! For a limited time, receive a free copy of Amy Dickinson's previous memoir, The Mighty Queens of Freevile ($14.99 retail price) with every purchase of Strangers Tend to Tell Me Things . Promotion ends 3/13/17 or while supplies last. 
Amy Dickinson--the voice behind America's most popular advice column "Ask Amy" and bestselling author of The Mighty Queens of Freeville --returns with her follow-up memoir of family, second chances, and finding love. 
Hardcover, 240 pages, measures 6" x 9". Qty: Additional Information Details Picking up where her earlier memoir The Mighty Queens of Freeville left off (more than 131,000 copies in print), Dickinson presents a new memoir of linked essays, creating a moving narrative exploring central themes of romance, death, parenting, health, and spiritual awakening. This is the material that feeds one of America's favorite advice columns "Ask Amy," but now she takes readers inside her own life. Amy writes about her love life, then her life-changing love affair and marriage to Bruno, the blending of their five children, parenting and step-parenting, caring for her ailing mother, and finding happiness in love and family. Additional Information
